Last time I was banned from anything, it was on an Unreal sever when I was I think 12-13 years old. Someone I didn't like entered the server I was on. He didn't like me either, so after a brief argument, he requested admin privileges from the admin, who he was friends with at the time. The admin gave it to him, and shortly afterward I was permabanned from the server.

Another strange one happened on the same game a few years later. My game got hacked by some mouthbreather and messed everything up. When I got it fixed and logged on to accuse him of screwing my game up, the admin (incidentally the same admin from the last story) didn't like me doing that and he temp-banned me. After that, it was just one massive drama tsunami.

I have a story back from the Minecraft Deadmau5's Sever, or whatever it was.

It must of been back two years or so now, and I decided to try my hand at 3d pixel art, so I got control of one of the plots, and started building.

I actually wasn't too bad, especially since I had never done it before.

So I was adding the finishing touches to a Ghast or something, I don't remember for sure, but this guy comes over, and gets the plot next to me.

I had no idea how much of a annoyance the internet could be back then, so I ignored him.

He builds this big tower, okay.

He then makes a rail atop it, alright.

Then he starts launching tens of hundreds of minecarts into my plot, completely and utterly destroying it (well I didn't lose any blocks, BUT it was unrecognizable)

He leaves, and then another guy comes over, and actually seemed quite sorry for me. (remember, this was two years ago, I didn't understand how much for a jerk the internet could be)(especially bronies sometimes(don't kill me, please)(I don't hate all bronies, just the annoying ones(you know what I mean))))

So he asks if he can help clean the plot, and I give him ability's to edit the plot.

He cleaned the plot alright, every last block of it, whole thing gone in under two minutes.

While I never did get banned, I learned a few things about the internet, and how I should think better.

If I didn't get banned, then why am I posting this here...
